definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: desire, delight—abs. ´[[ח]] Am 5:11+ 4 t.; only after a cstr.; [[נְטַעְתֶּם]] ´[[כַּרְמַיאח]] Am 5:11vineyards of desire (i.e. delightful vineyards) have ye planted; so rd. also Is 27:2 (for MT [[כֶּרֶם חֶמֶר]]) Codd. HCT LXX van d. H Lo Hi Ew De Di Che Du; so of fields ´[[שְׁדֵי ח]] Is 32:12; elsewh. of young men ´[[בַּחוּרֵי ח]] Ez Eze 23:6, Eze 23:12, Eze 23:23 desirable young men = fine, attractive, young men.
